title: Benim Için Üzülme
overview: Brothers Niyazi and Harun, sons of two deep-rooted families of the Black Sea, fall in love with Buke, the most beautiful eastern girl who came to the Black Sea with her father as a seasonal worker. This love will drag both families into endless pain and will ignite an irreversible conflict. On the other hand, the successful, intelligent and handsome son of the Avcıoğlu family, Sinan, who has been away from his home for years, will meet Bahar, the young and beautiful wife of the mining king Şahin Yılmaz, who loves him like his own son, and one of the Kılıçoğlus, whom Şahin wants to put in charge of his business. his wife Bahar; A very different future awaits, which the two families do not even want to imagine. In addition, Birgül, who does not bow to her grandfather's pressure and wants to study ballet in Batumi, and her mentally disabled brother Orhan, who is trying to hold on to life despite everything, will try to overcome all the obstacles that stand in their way for their dreams and will fight until the end.
